title: Data Gone Dark: Understanding power outages in the U.S.
description: A Python-based outage prediction pipeline using pandas and scikit-learn to classify power-outage severity across U.S. states, featuring preprocessing of weather and utility data, feature engineering, a written description with a narrative and a web dashboard for interactive visualization.

title: ARIMA sustainable stock portfolio optimizer
description: A Python-based model that forecasts returns using ARIMA and applies mean-variance optimization with ESG-based soft penalties, aligning portfolio performance with sustainability goals.

title: NBA Machine Learning Analytics
description: Built predictive models using NBA player and team statistics to analyze performance trends, forecast outcomes, and uncover key factors driving wins. Applied data cleaning, feature engineering, and regression/classification models to generate actionable insights and visualizations.

title: Veeva Systems Valuation Project
description: Developed a comprehensive valuation model for Veeva Systems using multiple approaches—including discounted cash flow (DCF), comparable company analysis, and precedent transactions—to estimate enterprise value and assess financial performance relative to industry peers.

title: EMG Controlled Drone
description: Developed a custom drone controlled by electromyography (EMG) signals from a wearable wristband. The system interprets muscle activity data to translate hand gestures into real-time flight commands, enabling RC controller-free drone navigation.

title: GMAT scores vs the usage of AI
description: Explores how the rise of generative AI tools like ChatGPT has impacted college students' cognitive performance, focusing on changes in GMAT Analytical Writing and Critical Reasoning scores. Uses GMAC data and AI usage surveys.
